features.title: Features
features.description: Automate your tasks by connecting your favorite services. Simple, powerful, and accessible to everyone.
features.intro: Create automated workflows between your favorite applications.
features.pricing: Plans adapted to your needs, from free to enterprise.
features.integrations: More than 100 compatible services for your automations.

home.description: Automate your tasks by connecting your favorite services. Simple, powerful, and accessible to everyone.

features.title: Automate your workflows

mobile.title: Mobile friendly
mobile.description: Our mobile app is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use, with a focus on simplicity and efficiency.

performance.title: AI Capabilities
performance.description: Leverage our AI-driven tools to automate workflows effortlessly. Experience intelligent automation tailored to your needs.

ai.title: AI Workflow Generation
ai.description: Generate your workflows with our AI workflow builder. No need to code, just describe your workflow and let the AI do the rest.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: All actions and reactions in our app are highly customizable, allowing you to tailor workflows to your specific needs.

connect.title: Connect Your Apps
connect.description: Seamlessly integrate your favorite apps like Discord, YouTube, and Google services. Create powerful automated workflows that work together.

stack.description: LinkIt allows you to orchestrate your favorite apps and services with a wide range of integrations.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Connect your Discord account to automate your workflows and stay connected with your community effortlessly.

apple.description: Connect your Apple account to automate your workflows and seamlessly integrate with your Apple ecosystem.

cta.description: Create your first workflow in minutes with our easy workflow builder.
